property.name: name
property.value: Kill the Giant Special Infected Boss

property.name: offer
property.value: Dart Feld, The true leader behind the clan, known as the 'F1' of 'The 5' has requested you to take care of a special infected that has been spotted in the area. This special infected has been causing major problems with smaller communities. Dart does not tolerate civillian deaths and is willing to pay you well for your work.
